features: 2 Way Coffee Maker for Pod and Grounds: This single brew coffee maker comes with a K-pod holder and a permanent filter, giving you two options for brewing coffee either using standard American coffee pods or using up to 20g of freshly ground coffee. The brew basket with a stained steel filter net makes it reusable and longer lasting. Best of all, the accessories, including the brew basket and capsule holder, are dishwasher safe.

Water Level Indicator & Multiple Brew Sizes – Equipped with a clear water window that displays measurements from 6 to 12 oz, this single cup coffee maker makes it easy to fill the water reservoir to the desired level for a smoother experience. Featuring a matte surface and BPA-free materials, the individual coffee brewer is not only safe, but also sleek and modern.

2-Mins Instant Brew Technology & 1-Button Operation – Requiring no complex processes, this personal coffee maker quickly brews a cup (12 oz) of coffee in just 2 minutes with the push of 1 button. Fast but hot, the coffee temperature reaches up to 180°F, allowing you to enjoy a fresh cup of coffee every busy morning.

Easy to Carry Mini Coffee Maker: The compact design of this small coffee maker (4.3" D x 7.8" W x 9.4" H) makes it is well-suited for small places like RVs, offices, dorm rooms and small apartments. The conveniently small size of this portable coffee maker allows you to travel with it and enjoy a cup of homemade coffee anywhere.

Descaling Reminder & Self-Cleaning: When the drip coffee machine needs to be cleaned, the built-in descaling reminder will alert you by lighting up red. Simply add some descaling solution and press the buttons for 2 seconds, and the single coffee brewer will start the cleaning process. This feature can avoid clogging problems and effectively prolong the life of this k pod coffee maker.

Usage tips: For the first use, run a brew cycle with just water, without adding coffee. This will help clean the 1 cup coffee maker and better extract the essence of the coffee. It can ONLY be used under US standard voltage 110V-120V, a voltage converter is needed if used in other countries.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The Famiworths Single Serve Mini Coffee Maker gives you two options to brew coffee, either using K-pod or ground coffee. The built-in rapid heating technology allows you to instantly enjoy a hotter cup of coffee in just 2 mins.

2 in 1 Coffee Maker for K Cup & Ground Coffee The 2-way brew feature allows you to choose between ground coffee and K-pods to brew the coffee of your choice. (Note: The handle of the holder or basket must be placed horizontally, otherwise the top lid cannot be closed properly.) Reservoir with Indicator & Larger Opening The larger opening of the water tank effectively reduces splashing, and the water window allows you to fill the water to your desired level with ease. Plus, all parts, including the brew basket and capsule holder, are removable and dishwasher safe for easy cleaning.

Instant Brew Technology and One-Button Operation With simple one button operation and instant brew technology, when using this coffee pod maker you can have your 12oz of delicious coffee up to 180℉ in just 2 minutes. Space Saving & Convenient to Carry The compact, space-saving design can fit in any space, including RVs, offices, and bedrooms, and allows you to take this small coffee maker on the go.

Descaling Reminder & Cleaning Function The built-in descaling reminder and the cleaning function make cleaning easy and help extend the life of this ground coffee maker. Other Protection Features The dual coffee maker will remind you with a flashing blue light when the reservoir is out of water or when the top lid is unlocked, making it safer to use.

How to descale the coffee maker? Step 1: The descale light turns red, indicating that the coffee machine needs cleaning. Step 2: Pour 12 oz of prepared descaling solution into the water reservoir. Step 3: Press the button for 2 seconds to start the descaling process. Step 4: After completing the descaling procedure, fill the reservoir with the maximum amount of water and proceed to press the brew button. Repeating this action twice will effectively cleanse the coffee maker's reservoir and inner tube.

Why can't the top lid be closed after attaching the basket filter or pod holder? The handle of the holder or basket should be placed horizontally, otherwise, the top lid will not be able to close properly. Why does the button flash blue and the single serve coffee maker doesn't work after pressing the button? The button flashes blue to remind you that there is no water or the top cover is not closed properly. Why does the DESCALE light turn red? The descale light turns red to remind you that the mini coffee maker needs to be descaled. But this reminder will not affect the preparation of the coffee. What cup height can this single coffee maker fit? Travel mugs or cups up to 5.5'' tall can fit in this coffee maker single serve. Does the single pod coffee maker use all the water added? Yes, the ground and pod coffee maker will use all the water in the tank to brew a cup of coffee.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Little One Cup Coffee Maker
reviews.reviewText: My other coffee single-serve coffee maker I use at work just quit one day. (GASP!) I needed a new one STAT but didn't really want to spend a small fortune to replace the other brand only to have it stop working again, so to Amazon I came. I compared several options in the price range and I'm super glad I chose the Famiworths Mini Coffee Maker. Why?1. As you can see in the picture, it's compact. Just the right size for my favorite mugs without taking up the extra desk space the other brand required. (I included K-Cups for size comparison.) Anyway, I like the size although I don't think it would work well with a mug that is giant (height or width) or weird-shaped, but it's great with normal mugs.2. It's lightweight, which makes it easily portable if that becomes necessary.3. I use it 15-20/week and so far it seems to be functioning just fine and it's quick! It seems to be a pretty sturdy little machine.4. It's the kind where you just add 6-12 oz. water as you go, so you don't have extra water in it just sitting around collecting dust or calcifying the machine.5. It uses either regular coffee pods but also comes with a re-usable filter so you're set if you want to just scoop in your favorite brand from a can. I like coffee options! :)I haven't had it long enough to really weigh in on cleaning, but it looks like that should be pretty simple too. I'll update the review if I find that isn't the case. (But can't imagine I'll need to.)If you're looking for a good, affordable, small, one-cup-at-a-time coffee maker, I highly recommend trying this one!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little coffee maker!
reviews.reviewText: Coffee maker takes up very little space on my counter. Easy to put away and take out. Easy to use fresh ground or pre-made pods. Pretty quick dispensing of coffee. No slower than the usual large machines.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars The perfect size, the perfect cup
reviews.reviewText: My old coffee pot died and I was desperate need of a new one. I’m not very impressed by the pods because I get tired of having to empty other people’s ’leftovers’. It’s not hot people, empty your pod when you’re done! However, after seeing some of the flavors of coffees, teas, hot chocolate, and even cider, how could I not become excited. Then when I saw I can get a dual function pot why not.It fits perfectly in my coffee station I’ve set up at home. Now I can continue to use the rest of my ground coffees try some pods as well.The coffee is made quickly and the pots shuts itself off. The coffee/beverage is good and hot.I love that there’s a window on the outside to see the water level.I love that the power button is on the top making very easy to reach.It is very light weight if I needed to move it around.The only con is that there is no hot plate to keep the brewed drink hot. If you get caught up and don’t have the coffee right then, you have to reheat it or brew another cup.The only other con, remove the pod before you remove the cup. If not the last few drops will drip down on the plate. It’s easy enough to wipe away so not a big deal.I haven’t had to to descale yet so I can’t speak on cleaning.I definitely would recommend and gift this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little coffee maker
reviews.reviewText: I have had this for about 4 months and use it almost daily. It makes a quick, flavorful cup of coffee and I like that I can see how many ounces of water I am adding. It takes up very little space on my counter. I often use the refillable cup and bought an extra since other refillable cups will not work in this machine. My only real complaint is that it seems flat on the bottom where the Kcups are brewed so I have to wipe out the machine each time or it drips. I would buy this again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Little Coffee Maker!
reviews.reviewText: Love my sweet little coffee maker. Quick, simple, and makes a hot cup of coffee! Easy to use. Just fill reservoir with desired amount of water. I just fill it up to the little hole in the back of the reservoir for a full mug of coffee, but there is a window with measurements on the side of the reservoir. Pop in a K-Cup, push the on button. Pretty much in a few seconds, will start pouring coffee, and it makes a cup pretty quickly. Then after it finishes and the coffee maker turns off, I remove the K-Cup pod and discard before removing my cup. Prevents drips of residual coffee. The coffee maker comes with a filter basket also to make a single cup of coffee with regular ground coffee, but haven't tried that yet. The coffee maker is much less expensive than the name brand, and works just as well. I like the idea of not letting stagnant water sit in the machine all the time. Our name brand machine at work has some green funk growing in the bottom of the water tank from water sitting in it all the time, and it never gets cleaned. I don't use that one. I make drip coffee at work. I need one of these at work!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to set up and use
reviews.reviewText: It’s a great 1 cup coffee maker. Smaller than I thought but it takes up very little counter space and performs well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It smells like sulfur?
reviews.reviewText: Of course after the return window closed, I started noticing when I would pull it forward from the back of the counter and opened a horrible smell, then I noticed brown like coffee stains if spilled and a puddle on my counter! I can’t figure out where it’s coming from or how to fix it!! I thought I’d have to replace again! Last one different brand but similar just died! Kitchen smelled like something was burning it was the coffee maker!! I wish I noticed sooner! I made a cup and the mug of coffee didn’t smell at all, other than like coffee! Now it’s telling me to descale, but I came to check and not seeing directions as to what to use? Idk white vinegar! It works great! I would just say is it be mindful of what’s happened to mine, and if yours smells or there’s water /coffee on your counter, replace before those 30 days are up!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great inexpensive one cup coffee maker
reviews.reviewText: Number One - read the directions! After that this coffee maker works flawlessly. I have used mine with k-cups for about two months. I normally only drink one or two cups a day. If you follow the directions and place the k-cup adapter (supplied) in it's correct position the machine makes a cup of coffee in about two minutes, good and hot! One thing I don't like is with a regular 8-10 oz cup the coffee does splash some because of the distance from the outlet down to the cup. I solved this by cutting a piece of wood the size of the cup bottom x 1 1/2 inches thick to set the cup on. Works great, no splashing. I love the coffee maker!

Entendí que era compatible con todas las cápsulas de café pero no es así, las de Dolce Gusto de Nescafé no quedan que son las que tengo….voy a empezar a buscar cuales le quedan….pero me hice un cafecito con café molido y estuvo perfecto , caliente y rápido.
